[[File:Jenny Dolfen - Fields of Gold.jpg|250px|thumb|''Fields of Gold'' by [[Jenny Dolfen]]]]
The '''Pastures of [[Yavanna]]''' were in [[Valinor]], in the southern part of the land.  To the east were, successively, the [[Woods of Oromë]], the [[Hyamentir]], and the narrow land of [[Avathar]].  These pastures were golden with the tall wheat of the gods.<ref>{{S|Darkening}}</ref>
